name: Zygon 2025 - Cultural Fest Opening Ceremony
description: Grand opening of the annual cultural festival featuring traditional dance performances, music concerts, and celebrity guest appearances.

name: Zygon - Battle of Bands
description: Inter-college rock band competition with live performances, judged by industry professionals. Winner gets recording studio time.

name: Zygon - Fashion Show Extravaganza
description: Theme-based fashion show showcasing student creativity in costume design and modeling with professional choreography.

name: Nirman 2025 - Technical Fest Inauguration
description: Launch of the premier technical festival featuring keynote speeches from tech industry leaders and innovation showcases.

name: Nirman - Code Marathon
description: 48-hour coding competition across multiple programming languages with real-world problem statements and industry mentors.

name: Nirman - AI/ML Workshop Series
description: Hands-on workshop on Machine Learning fundamentals, neural networks, and practical AI applications in industry.

name: Innovation Ideathon 2025
description: 24-hour ideation competition focusing on sustainable solutions for real-world problems with startup incubation opportunities.

name: Silicon Hackathon - FinTech Edition
description: 36-hour hackathon focused on financial technology solutions with mentorship from fintech industry experts and VCs.

name: Robo-Race Championship
description: Autonomous robot racing competition with obstacle courses, line following, and manual control categories for different skill levels.

name: Drone Building Workshop
description: Build and program your own drone from scratch. Learn about aerodynamics, flight controllers, and autonomous navigation.

name: Meta Literature Fest - Grand Opening
description: Inaugural ceremony of the literature festival celebrating creative writing, poetry, and academic discourse with renowned authors.

name: Inter-College Debate Championship
description: Oxford-style debate competition on contemporary issues with teams from top colleges across the region.

name: Model United Nations (MUN) Conference
description: 3-day MUN conference simulating UN committees discussing global issues like climate change, international security, and human rights.

name: Poetry Slam Competition
description: Open mic poetry competition featuring original compositions in multiple languages with live audience voting.

name: Creative Writing Workshop
description: Masterclass on storytelling, character development, and publishing with bestselling authors and literary agents.

name: Annual Sports Meet - Opening Ceremony
description: Grand opening of the annual inter-department sports competition with march past, torch lighting, and sports demonstrations.

name: Inter-Department Cricket Tournament
description: T20 cricket championship between all academic departments with knockout format and live commentary.

name: Football League Championship
description: 7-a-side football tournament with teams representing different years and departments competing for the golden boot.

name: Basketball Slam Dunk Contest
description: Individual basketball skills competition including 3-point shootout, free throws, and slam dunk championships.

name: Badminton Mixed Doubles Championship
description: Professional badminton tournament with men's, women's, and mixed doubles categories featuring local and guest players.

name: Table Tennis Tournament
description: Singles and doubles table tennis competition with both beginners and advanced categories for maximum participation.

name: Athletics Championship
description: Track and field events including 100m sprint, relay races, long jump, shot put, and marathon with state-level standards.

name: Swimming Gala
description: Aquatic sports competition featuring freestyle, backstroke, breaststroke, and relay swimming events for all skill levels.

name: Volleyball Spike Championship
description: Beach volleyball and indoor volleyball tournaments with co-ed teams representing different academic departments.

name: Chess Grand Master Tournament
description: Strategic chess championship with rapid and classical formats, featuring guest grandmaster exhibitions and simultaneous games.

name: Zygon - DJ Night & Dance Battle
description: Electronic music night with professional DJ sets followed by freestyle and group dance competitions with cash prizes.

name: Zygon - Drama Competition
description: One-act play competition showcasing original scripts and adaptations with themes of social relevance and entertainment.

name: Nirman - Web Development Bootcamp
description: Intensive full-stack web development workshop covering React, Node.js, databases, and deployment strategies.

name: Nirman - Cybersecurity Challenge
description: Capture The Flag (CTF) competition focusing on ethical hacking, penetration testing, and cybersecurity awareness.

name: Startup Pitch Competition
description: Entrepreneurship competition where students pitch their startup ideas to investor panel with seed funding opportunities.

name: Meta - Literary Magazine Launch
description: Release of the annual college literary magazine featuring student poems, short stories, essays, and artwork.

name: Guest Lecture: Industry 4.0
description: Expert talk on the fourth industrial revolution, IoT, AI integration in manufacturing, and future career opportunities.

name: Career Fair 2025
description: Annual placement drive with 50+ companies offering internships and full-time positions across various industries.

name: Environmental Awareness Marathon
description: 5K fun run promoting environmental consciousness with tree plantation drive and sustainability workshops.

name: Annual College Fest Grand Finale
description: Closing ceremony celebrating all achievements of the academic year with cultural performances, awards, and alumni meet.
